title: Your name is now the name of your main
body:
How does it affect your life IRL?

people would think that i'm a stalker or something...., since Nocturne means "live at night" in french.

replies.body:
Mordekaiser, fuck ya

Wait?

My name is the name of my main or the name of my main is now my name?

Because I am confused....
Your name becomes that of the champion you main. So if you mained Teemo your name would be Satan.

https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/417479458090926080/XBHN_3YJ.jpeg
Seriously though, might get annoyed by telling people they should call me Draaaaven every damn time they call me Draven

I'd be asked why I'm more than 10 years old
I'm a 230 pound bearded bodybuilder. Call me Caitlyn.

I'd be Sion, in Sion, playing in the  Sion FC. •_•
you better drive a scion

'Nocturne' is a noun or adjective, not a verb. If you mean 'live at night' as an adjective (i.e. X thing active at night = qqchose nocturne) then you should be saying "nocturne means nocturnal in french", which is quite a bit clearer ("live at night" looks like a verb on first impression in this context) and also much more obvious ('nocturne' and 'nocturnal' obviously sound related).

thanks for you help m8, i'm not that good when it comes to speak english :/ 

but nocturnal animal means an animal living at night so that's why i chose this definition.

No problem, sorry if it sounded condescending or anything :/ Just hope it was helpful, as 'nocturnal' is a very well-known term in English so at least you'll know to use it in future.

I'm sure you get this a lot but your English is very good by the way. It takes me a long time to compose French posts elsewhere on the internet and I'm still not sure they're well-written despite the effort I go to. Languages are hard :(

{{champion:120}} 

People would probably think I'm a weird emo poser.

"Your name is Hecarim? What kind of name is that??"

The name you will scream out in terror mwhahahahaha
